section.p: You are sold to a man from Akatsurai, and set to work on an Akatsuran warship. This is a ship of the Shogun of Akatsurai. Fortunately for you, the captain recognizes you. He has you freed immediately and is almost grovellingly apologetic.
You are treated royally in his cabin, where you can restore any lost Stamina points. He also provides you with a , a suit of and . He sets you off in Yarimura. .
